content:
FILE_WRITTEN:.github/workflows/ci.yml
DIR_STATE:[".github/workflows/ci.yml", ".github/workflows/tests-and-capture-artifacts.yml"]
SUMMARY: Added a GitHub Actions CI workflow that installs dependencies and runs pytest across multiple Python versions to enforce unified OUTPUT_DIR behavior.
